name: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.maxDosePerDay
title: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.maxDosePerDay
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The maximum dose per day (maximum dose quantity to be administered in any one 24-h period) that can be administered as per the protocol referenced in the clinical trial authorisation
element.definition: The maximum dose per day (maximum dose quantity to be administered in any one 24-h period) that can be administered as per the protocol referenced in the clinical trial authorisation.
